title: Revision Flags
description: Schema describing flags raised against canon records that require revision.

flags.description: List of flags indicating canon entries needing review or changes.

flag.description: A single flag raised against a canon record.

flagId.description: Unique identifier for the flag (e.g., a UUID).

recordId.description: Identifier of the canon record being flagged.

flaggedBy.description: Identifier of the person or system that raised the flag.

reason.description: Explanation of why the record is being flagged.

timestampFlagged.description: ISOÂ 8601 timestamp when the flag was created.

status.description: Current status of the flag. 'open' means pending action; 'resolved' indicates the flag has been addressed.

resolutionNote.description: Optional note describing how the flag was resolved.
